page.title: 05BURGHFIELD COMMON-SCHOOLS
page.content: In Burghfield Common there are four schools:-Willink,Blands,Garland and Padworth College. Mrs Bland's Infants School caters for 5-7 year olds,and the headmistress is Mrs Forbes.A small nursery school is located nearby.On the same plot is Willink School,a comprehensive,with 6th Form,for 11-18 year olds.The head- teacher is Miss M.Hulbert.For children in the 8-11 age group,there is Garland County Junior School on Clayhill Road, where the headmistress is Miss Pyman. Children in the area have the option to go to St.Mary's School (5-11) in Burghfield,and Hugh Faringdon Roman Catholic School (11-18) in Reading. On Auclum Lane in Burghfield Common, there is part of Padworth College,a private school mainly for foreign students.The college also has centres in Mortimer and Padworth.
